titles.title: Defending the Integrity of Voting Systems Act
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit interference with voting systems under the Computer Fraud and Abuse Act.
Defending the Integrity of Voting Systems Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Defending the Integrity of Voting Systems Act
This bill amends the federal criminal code to broaden the definition of " protected computer," for purposes of computer fraud and abuse offenses, to include a computer that is part of a voting system.
